Autoprefixer.description: Sublime plugin to prefix your CSS

Better QUnit.description: A custom QUnit package, that includes snippets, custom syntax highlighters and more!

Better RSpec.description: A custom RSpec package, that includes snippets, custom syntax highlighters and more!

Better Rails.description: A custom Rails package, that includes snippets, custom syntax highlighters and more!

Better Ruby.description: A custom Ruby package, that includes snippets, custom syntax highlighters and more!

Bundler Autocomplete.description: Autocomplete requires using your project's Gemfile as the source.

Close Others.description: Close other tabs and windows with shortcuts.

Codefmt.description: A plugin that allows applying code formatting with minimum configuration.

Expand Selection to Quotes.description: Sublime Text plugin to expand selection to surrounding quotes

Name That Color.description: Fetch the color name for hexdecimal RGBs from different sources.

Ruby File Toggle.description: A plugin that switches from implementation to test file and vice-versa. Supports minitest and rspec.

SmartyPants.description: Apply better typography to texts in Sublime Text.

SublimeEnv.description: Set environment variables in the scope of Sublime Text. Useful when you want to run commands from Sublime Text, or set default environment variables for language compilers.

Switch Case.description: Alternate between different cases (snake_case, SCREAM_SNAKE_CASE, CamelCase, camelBack, and hyphenate).
